mapper.sql: USER_ID as userId, LOGIN_NM as loginNm, PASSWORDS as passwords, WEAK_PW_IND as weakPwInd, USER_NM as userNm, USER_MOBILE as userMobile, USER_EMAIL as userEmail, USER_PHOTO_URL as userPhotoUrl, IDENTITY as identity, USER_NBR as userNbr, OFC_ID as ofcId, CREATE_TIME as createTime, VALID_IND as validInd, REL_VENUES_ID as relVenuesId, PROVINCE as province, CITY as city, AREA as area, TOWN as town
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RM_SYS_USER_INFO ( OFC_ID, DEP_ID, LOGIN_NM, PASSWORDS, USER_NBR, USER_NM, USER_EMAIL, USER_TEL, USER_MOBILE, USER_TYPE_CD, USER_PHOTO_URL, LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_TIME, LOGIN_IND, VALID_IND, USER_OA_NM, WEAK_PW_IND, IDENTITY, CREATE_TIME, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, PROVINCE, CITY, AREA, TOWN, REL_VENUES_ID ) VALUES ( 10001, NULL, #{loginNm}, #{passwords}, #{userNbr}, #{userNm}, #{userEmail}, NULL, #{userMobile}, NULL, #{userPhotoUrl}, NULL, NULL, '0', '1', NULL, #{weakPwInd}, #{identity}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{town}, #{relVenuesId} );
mapper.select:
select
from RM_SYS_USER_INFO where USER_NBR = #{userNbr}

select
from RM_SYS_USER_INFO where USER_MOBILE= #{userMobile} or LOGIN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userMobile},'%') or USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userMobile},'%')
select max(USER_NBR) as userNbr from RM_SYS_USER_INFO
mapper.update: update RM_SYS_USER_INFO set VALID_IND='0' where USER_ID = #{userId}

update RM_SYS_USER_INFO set LOGIN_NM = #{loginNm}, USER_NM = #{userNm}, USER_MOBILE = #{userMobile}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_PHOTO_URL = #{userPhotoUrl}, IDENTITY = #{identity}, REL_VENUES_ID = #{relVenuesId}, PROVINCE = #{province}, CITY = #{city}, AREA = #{area}, TOWN = #{town}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select:
select u.IDENTITY as identity from act_hi_identitylink h left join rm_sys_user_info u on h.USER_ID_=u.USER_MOBILE where h.TYPE_='starter'
and h.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{procInstId}

select zy.USER_NBR as userNbr, USER_MOBILE as userMobile, USER_NM as userNm from rm_sys_user_info zy where zy.VALID_IND='1' and IDENTITY in ('10000006','10000007')
AND zy.REL_VENUES_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{relVenuesId},'%')

select distinct jw.USER_NBR as userNbr, jw.USER_MOBILE as userMobile, jw.USER_NM as userNm from rm_sys_user_info jw left join rm_sys_user_info zy on jw.town=zy.town and zy.IDENTITY='10000007' where jw.VALID_IND='1' and jw.IDENTITY='10000004'
AND zy.REL_VENUES_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{relVenuesId},'%')
select count(u.USER_ID) from RM_SYS_USER_INFO u where u.IDENTITY='10000007' and u.VALID_IND='1' AND u.REL_VENUES_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{relVenuesId},'%')
select count(zz.USER_ID) from RM_SYS_USER_INFO zz where zz.IDENTITY='10000006' and zz.VALID_IND='1' and zz.REL_VENUES_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{relVenuesId},'%')

select USER_ID as userId, USER_NM as userNm, USER_MOBILE as userMobile, USER_PHOTO_URL as userPhotoUrl, IDENTITY as identity, ro.ROLE_NM as identityCn, AREA as area, aa.AREA_NAME as areaName, tn.TOWN_NAME as townName, TOWN as town from RM_SYS_USER_INFO u left join rm_sys_role ro on ro.ROLE_ID=u.IDENTITY left join rm_town_info tn on tn.TOWN_CODE=u.TOWN left join rm_area_info aa on aa.AREA_CODE=u.AREA where USER_MOBILE= #{search} or LOGIN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
